meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by the protozoan parasite Trichomonas.
meanings.sent1: The trichomonal infection was easily treated with medication.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with a trichomonal infection.
meanings.sent3: Even the trichomonal parasite needs a cozy home to thrive.
meanings.sent4: The trichomonal presence in the water was a red flag for contamination.
meanings.sent5: The trichomonal nature of the disease made it recognizable to the experienced nurse.

meanings.sent1: The trichomonal symptoms were concerning to the patient.
meanings.sent2: She visited the clinic for a trichomonal check-up.
meanings.sent3: The trichomonal outbreak at the school caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: His trichomonal condition was a roadblock to his travel plans.
meanings.sent5: The trichomonal impact on public health was significant in the region.
